synopsis.text: Productions 765 is on the brink of their Fan Appreciation Event, and the idols are all set to head home for the day. However, Chihaya Kisaragi's pre-event jitters lead her to squeeze in a last-minute rehearsal. Little does she know, this decision will spark a chain of thrilling escapades, dragging Miki and Haruka along for the ride. From an unexpected truck journey to the mysteries of an old house, the trio faces a series of hurdles. Will they make it to the event on time? Join Miki, Haruka, Chihaya, and the rest of the idols as they embark on their most significant adventure yet!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
